title: Bee Sting Relief
author: lando
citation: lando. "Bee Sting Relief: experience with Kava & Toothpaste (ID 63271)". Erowid.org. Sep 27, 2007. erowid.org/exp/63271
report: Allthough I have only tried this once for myself and my girlfriend, I have found that the aplication of a mixture of kava extract and toothpaste have noticeable effects when applied to a bee sting. While the glycerine in most toothpastes dry out the toxins of the sting, the kava provides relief as a local anasthetic as well a reducer of swelling. Results were within 5-10 miuntes.
